```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(infer)


arrestNFL <- read.csv("arrests.csv")


head(arrestNFL)
ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(y = arrests, x = week_num, color = home_team)) + 
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5)

ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(y = arrests, x = day_of_week, color = home_team)) + 
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5)

ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(y = arrests, x = gametime_local, color = home_team)) + 
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5)

ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(x = arrests, fill = division_game)) + 
    geom_histogram()  + 
    facet_wrap( ~ division_game)

ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(x = arrests, fill = home_team)) + 
    geom_histogram()  + 
    facet_wrap( ~ day_of_week)

ggplot(arrestNFL, aes(y = arrests, x = (home_score-away_score), color = (home_score-away_score>0))) + 
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5)


```
